page.title: 09Beath High School.
page.content: When the primary 7 pupils leave our school they attend Beath High School .Pupils come from 9 local schools to be taught there.The pupils are divided into 4 houses with a guidance teacher for each one .The houses are named Aitken, Glencraig, Kirkford and Lindsay.They are named after collieries which used to be used in this area.Pupils are supposed to wear school uniform and the school colours are blue and pale grey.At Beath High we will get extra subjects which we don't get here,such as Science, Biology, Home Economics,French and Woodwork.1st and 2nd year pupils go to Beath Junior and from 3rd year upwards they attend Beath Senior which is a short distance away.
